TopicTitle: Make up your mind KSP! (But it's not really bad)

Articles.Content: So, if you have been reading my posts about my KSP issues, you know what this will be about. But not like that. KSP, once again, has tried going back to no lagging. But, I think I may have found out why. It turns out that the application for KSP in it's folder is different from the KSP game in Steam. Along with going onto the launcher and turning on an option that "may increase performance", it actually runs smoother than ever now. I even have it set to medium graphic settings and it's still fine. My only solution I could have come with is that Steam just didn't like KSP for some unknown reason. Weird. But I'm just overjoyed now. Unless within the next hour of when I post this thread it starts lagging again... I really, REALLY hope not. Oh well.

I am genuinely confused by your post.

and that's strange, I never get confused

I am genuinely confused by your post.

and that's strange, I never get confused

Same lol.

How is the KSP app not in the same folder? Did you move it or do you have a steam version in addition to squads?

When I took a look inside the folders, it had it's own shortcut to the game. I tried it out. Now it works fine. Trust me, I don't exactly know either. But hey, as long as my KSP doesn't lag, I'm not complaining!
